p: On the other hand, flow cytometry analysis with annexin V and PI staining indicated that MOL fraction no. 7 was not only able to induce apoptosis but also triggered necrotic cell death in MDA-MB-231 cells. This mechanism might be caused by the activation of caspase-3 which triggers cross-talk to necrotic signaling, resulting in secondary necrosis [ 48, 49]. The main features of secondary necrosis are osmotic cell swelling and lysis that lead to leakage of the cell contents; thereby it may cause tissue injury and induction of inflammation and other immune responses if the dying cells are not quickly removed by phagocytes [ 48, 49]. MOL fraction no. 7 induced MDA-MB-231 cell cycle arrest at G2/M phase similar to the study of Al-Asmari et al., that found increased MDA-MB-231 cell accumulation in the G2/M phase after treatment with crude EtOAc extract [ 50].
